flavor: Sea lo que sea que estéis planeando, no funcionará
name: Capitán Phasma
subtitle: Soldado de élite
text: Tus personajes que no sean únicos tienen la palabra clave Guardián.

flavor: Los miembros de esta nueva generación de soldados de asalto son entrenados desde su nacimiento y sometidos a un régimen constante de propaganda de la Primera Orden para asegurar su lealtad absoluta.
name: Soldado de asalto de la Primera Orden

flavor: The All Terrain Scout Transport filled both support and reconnaissance roles in the Galactic Empire's war machine.
name: AT-ST
text: [special] - Discard a support from play.

name: First Order TIE Fighter
text: [special] - Remove all shield from all of an opponent's characters.

name: Commanding Presence
text:
Rec character only.
[special] - Choose a Red die. If it is your die, resolve it, increasing its value by 2. If it is an opponent's die, remove it.

name: F-11D Rifle
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Force an opponent to deal 2 damage to their characters, distributing the damage as they wish.

name: Conde Dooku
subtitle: Estratega artero
text: Antes de que a este Personaje se le inflija 1 o más puntos de daño, puedes descartar una carta de tu mano para entregarle 1 escudo.

name: Darth Vader
subtitle: Sith Lord
text: After you activate this character you may force an opponent to choose and discard a card from their hand.

name: Kylo Ren
subtitle: Discípulo de Vader
text: [special] - Elige un Personaje de un adversario. Luego mira una carta escogida al azar de la mano de ese adversario e inflige tanto daño a ese Personaje como el coste de la carta que acabas de mirar.

name: Estrangular con la Fuerza
text:
Sólo Personaje de color Azul.
[special] - Inflige 1 punto de daño no anulable a otro Personaje. Luego puedes girar a cualquier cara 1 de sus dados de Personaje o Mejora.

name: Immobilize
text: Blue Character only. Action - Remove this die to turn a die to a side showing a blank ([blank]).

name: Holocrón sith
text: [special] - Intercambia esta Mejora con una Mejora de capacidad de color Azul en tu mano, ignorando sus restricciones para jugarla. A continuación, puedes gastar 1 recurso para trar su dado en tu reserva, si es posible.

name: Infantry Grenades
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to each of an opponent's characters. Discard this upgrade from play.

flavor: "There can be no mistakes this time."
name: Jango Fett
subtitle: Lethal Mercenary
text: After an opponent activates a character, you may activate this character.

name: Gaffi Stick
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Remove one of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]) to deal 3 damage to a character.

name: Leia Organa
subtitle: Líder nata
text: Acción - Retira este dado para volver a tirar hasta 2 de tus dados.

name: Poe Dameron
subtitle: As de ases
text: [special] - Descarta una carta de tu mano para resolver 1 de las caras de su dado, si es posible. Luego, si era una carta de vehículo, puedes pagar su coste para jugarla de tu pila de descarte.

flavor: Poe Dameron's X-Wing was modified to be even more versatile than the standard T-70
name: Black One
text: [special] - Deal 1 damage to a character. Reroll this die instead of removing it from your pool.

name: Scout
text: [special] - Look at an opponent's hand and discard the cheapest card from it (you choose in the case of a tie).

flavor: "Yo soy un jedi, como mi padre antes que yo."
name: Luke Skywalker
subtitle: Caballero jedi
text: Después de que actives este Personaje, roba 1 carta.

name: Qui-Gon Jinn
subtitle: Ataru Master
text: Before this character gains 1 or more shields, you may remove 1 of his shields to deal 1 damage to a character.

name: Rey
subtitle: Prodigio de la Fuerza
text: Después de que juegues una Mejora en este Personaje, puedes realizar 1 acción adicional.

name: Túnica jedi
text: Después de que juegues esta Mejora, entre 1 escudo al Personaje al que está vinculada, o 2 escudos si ésta es la primera ronda de la partida.

name: One with The Force
text:
Blue character only.
Before attached character is defeated, this upgrade becomes a support for the rest of the game (it starts ready).

flavor: "Orange and white: one of a kind." <cite>Poe Dameron</cite>
name: BB-8
text: [special] - Reroll this die and one of your other dice.  Do not remove this die from your pool after resolving this ability.

name: Rey's Staff
text: [special] - Remove a die showing damage ([melee] or [ranged])

name: Finn
subtitle: Desertor de la Primera Orden
text: Puedes vincular cualquier arma a este Personaje, ignorando las restricciones de juego. Puedes incluir en tu mazo armas y vehículos de Villano de color Rojo.

name: Han Solo
text: Después de que juegues una carta con la palabra clave Emboscada, puedes entregar 1 escudo a este Personaje.

flavor: "No tendrá buen aspecto, pero los resultados sí son buenos." <cite>Han Solo</cite>
name: Halcón Milenario
text: [special] - Juega un Evento de color Amarillo de tu pila de descarte o de tu mano sin pagar coste alguno.

name: Outpost
text: [special] - Resolve the battlefield ability as if you had just claimed it.

flavor: The weapon of choice for rebel soldiers and imperial officers alike during the Galactic Civil War.
name: DH-17 Blaster Pistol
Fusil Bláster IQA-11
text: [special] - Inflige 2 puntos de daño no anulable a un Personaje.

name: Promotion
text:
Red character only.
After you play this upgrade, you may draw a card.

name: Force Throw
text:
Blue Character Only.
[special] - Remove a die to deal a character damage equal to the value showing on that die (specials and blanks are zeros).

name: Entrenamiento en la Fuerza
text:
Para jugar esta carta, señala un Personaje de color Azul.
[special] - Elige y haz 2 de la siguientes opciones: infligir 1 punto de daño a un Personaje o recibir 1 recurso o entregar 1 escudo a un Personaje.

name: Lightsaber
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.

name: Mind Probe
text:
Blue Character only.
[special] - Deal an opponent's character 1 damage for each card in that opponent's hand.

name: Comunicador
text: Después de que juegues esta Mejora, puedes volver a tirar cualquier cantidad de tus dados o cualquier cantidad de los dados de un adversario.

name: Bláster de bolsillo
text: Emboscada. Redesplegar.

name: Mochila propulsora
text: [special] - Retira un dado que muestre daño cuerpo a cuerpo ([melee]) y entrega 1 escudo al Personaje que tiene vinculada esta Mejora.

flavor: Los droides de batalla son menos efectivos que los soldados de carne y hueso, pero también son mucho más barato de reemplazar.
name: Filas interminables
text: Elige 1 de tus Personajes de color Rojo derrotados que no sea único y devuélvelo a la partida sin ningún punto de daño en él.

name: Occupation
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Force an opponent to lose all of their resources.

name: Tactical Mastery
text: Spot a Red character to take up to 2 additional actions.

name: The Best Defense...
text: Deal one of your Red characters 3 damage to remove up to 2 of an opponent's dice.

name: Drudge Work
text: Action - Exhaust this support and one of your characters to gain 1 resource.

name: Local Garrison
text: Each opponent gains 1 fewer resource during each upkeep phase to a minimum of 1.

name: Enrage
text: Deal 1 damage to one of your Blue characters to gain 1 resource.

flavor: "Let the hate flow through you." <cite>Emperor Palpatine</cite>
name: Fello Your Anger
text: Count the number of blanks ([blank]) showing on an opponent's dice. Remove that many of their dice.

name: Intimidate
text: Remove all shields from a character.

name: Power of the Dark Side
text: Action - Exaust this support to reroll one of your dice. If that die rolls a blank ([blank]), deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.

name: Nowhere to Run
text: Turn each of your dice showing a blank to any side.

name: Ace in the Hole
text: Discard a Yellow upgrade from your hand to roll its die into your pool, if able. Set aside that die after it is resolved or removed.

name: Go for the Kill
text: Resolve one of your dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]), treating this damage as unblockable.

name: My Kind of Scum
text: After you resolve a die showing disrupt ([disrupt]), you may exhaust this support to gain resources equal to the number of resources your opponent just lost.

name: Commando Raid
text: Resolve one of your Red dice showing discard ([discard]), increasing its value by 2. Then draw a card.

name: Defensive Position
text: Play only if you control the battlefield. Remove all of an opponent's dice showing a value of 2 or higher.

name: Hit and Run
text:
Ambush.
Activate one of your Red characters.

name: Natural Talent
text: Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1.

name: Rearm
text: Play a Red upgrade from your discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1.

name: Surgical Strike
text: Remove any number of your Red dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]), increasing each of their values by 1, to discard a support from play that costs equal to or less than the combined value of those dice.

name: Defensive Stance
text: Give a character 2 shields.

name: Heroism
text: Deal one of your unique characters damage equal to the value of an opponent's die showing damage. Then remove that die.

name: Noble Sacrifice
text: Defeat one of your Blue characters to exhaust a character.

name: Patience
text: Remove any number of your dice. Then discard cards from the top of an opponent's deck equal to the number of dice you just removed.

name: Jedi Council
text: Action - Exhaust this support to look at the top 2 cards of a palyer's deck. Then you may discard one of those cards and have that player draw the other.

name: Awakening
text: Action - Exhaust this support to resolve one of your dice showing a modified side (a side with a +) as if it was not modified (did not have the +).

name: The Force is Strong
text: Action - Exhaust this support and discard a Blue card from your hand to play another copy of that card from your hand for free.

name: Daring Escape
text:
Ambush.
Reroll any number of an opponent's dice. Then remove all of ther dice showing blanks ([blank]).

name: No te pongas nervioso
text: Cada jugador roba 2 cartas.

name: Draw Attention
text: Move up to 2 damage from one of your characters to another one of your characters (this ignores shields).

name: Hyperspace Jump
text: End the action phase. You may switch the battlefield with the battlefield that is not being used.

name: Let The Wookie Win
text: Force an opponent to choose to either deal one of their exausted characters 2 damage or choose and remove 2 of their dice.

name: Negotiate
text: Remove one of your character dice to force an opponent to choose and remove 2 of their dice.

name: Scavenge
text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. Then you may add an upgrade or support from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Smuggling
text: Spot a Yellow character and discard a card from your hand to gain 1 resource.

name: Second Chance
text:
Yellow character only.
Before attached character would be defeated, instead heal 5 damage from it and discard this upgrade from play.

name: Award Ceremony
text: Spot a Red character to draw cards equal to the number of exhausted characters you have.

name: Dug in
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Give 3 shields to your characters, distributed as you wish.

name: Squad Tactics
text: Activate any number of your non-unique characters at once.

name: Deflect
text: Spot a Blue character to remove a die showing ranged damage ([ranged]) and deal half of that damage, rounded up, to a character.

name: Disturbance in the Force
text: Reroll all dice.

name: Truco mental
text: Señala un Personaje de color Azul para obligar a un adversario a dividir su reserva de dados en 2 grupos de cualquier tamaño. Elige 1 de esos grupos y retira todos los dados que hay en él.

name: The Power of the Force
text: Resolve one of your dice, treating its value as equal to the number of Blue upgrades you have in play.

name: Utilizar la Fuerza
text: Señala un Personaje de color Azul para girar un dado a cualquier cara.

name: Aim
text: Turn one of your dice to a shide showing ranged damage.

name: Block
text: Remove all of an opponent's dice showing melee damage.

name: Close Quarters Assault
text: Count the number of dice you have showing mele damage. Discard that many random cards from an opponent's hand.

name: Dodge
text: Remove all of an opponent's dice showing ranged damage ([ranged])

name: Flank
text:
Play only if you have more ready characters than an opponent.
Remove one of that opponent's dice.

name: Ponerse a cubierto
text: Entrega 1 escudo a un Personaje.

name: Disarm
text: Remove one of your dice showing damage ([melee] or [ranged]) to discard a weapon or equipment from play that costs equal to or less than the value of that die.

name: Reversal
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove a die showing damage ([melee] or [ranged]) and deal that damage to a character.

name: Unpredictable
text:
Ambush.
Reroll a die (yours or an opponent's).

name: Echo Base
subtitle: Hoth
text: Claim - Give a character 1 shield.

name: Emperor's Throne Room
subtitle: Death Star II
text: Claim - Turn one of your dice to a side showing a special ability ([special]). Then you may resolve that die.

name: Yermos helados
subtitle: Base Starkiller
text: Reclamar - Retira un dado de Personaje.

name: Arsenal imperial
subtitle: Estrella de la Muerte
text: Reclamar - Juega una Mejora de tu mano, reduciendo en 1 su coste.

name: Rebel War Room
subtitle: Yavin IV
text: Claim - Resolve one of your dice. If it has a resource cost, you do not have to pay it.

name: Separatist Base
subtitle: Mustafar
text: Claim - Each opponent chooses and deals 1 unblockable damage to one of their characters.

name: Cementerio de astronaves
subtitle: Jakku
text: Reclamar - Elige un Apoyo o Mejora en tu pila de descarte y colócalo en la parte superior de tu mazo.
